class_a_06_ecology_01:
Hello, hello. I hope everyone’s ready to learn
some new things today![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_06_ecology_02:
But before we get going, do you all remember
the final question from our midterm exam?[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_06_ecology_03:
Well, Director Clavell found out about it
somehow, and I got yelled at. Whoops.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_06_ecology_04:
Apparently he could tell I was hiding something
just by looking at me.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_06_ecology_05:
He must’ve noticed all the color flush right out of
my face! Haha![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_06_ecology_06:
Speaking of color, today I’d like to teach you
all about colors as they pertain to Pokémon![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_06_ecology_07:
Some Pokémon have slightly different coloration
or patterning on their bodies based on their\r
gender or individual differences.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_06_ecology_08:
In very rare cases, a Pokémon may have wildly
different coloration compared to others of the\r
same species.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_06_ecology_09: We call these specimens [VAR COLOR(0006)]Shiny [VAR COLOR(0000)]Pokémon.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_06_ecology_10: It is quite rare to cross paths with one.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_06_ecology_11:
Does anyone here know what the likelihood of
finding a Shiny Pokémon is?[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_06_ecology_answer_01:
It would be nice if they were that common! We
would be able to do far more research on them.\r
But they’re actually quite a bit more rare.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_06_ecology_answer_02:
That’s not a bad guess. But they’re actually
even rarer than 1 in 400![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_06_ecology_answer_03:
Wow! That’s right! You may have the makings of a
Pokémon Professor, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_06_ecology_12:
Shiny Pokémon appear at a rate of 1 in 4,000.
Isn’t that amazing?[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_06_ecology_13:
The probability of encountering one in the wild is
the same as hatching one from an Egg, too![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_06_ecology_14:
Eggs from a pair of Pokémon raised around
differing languages are a special case.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_06_ecology_15:
There is a higher than average chance that
a Shiny Pokémon will hatch from these Eggs.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_06_ecology_16:
But we haven’t been able to figure out why that is
just yet.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_06_ecology_17:
I’ve also heard rumors of a charm that increases
your likelihood of finding Shiny Pokémon when\r
you have it in your Bag—can you believe that?![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_06_ecology_18:
This claim can’t be scientifically verified, but it
sure would be fun if it were true.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_06_ecology_20: That’s all for today. Thank you for your attention![VAR 0114(002A)]
